title: I cannot access the Unity ID accounts pages

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am trying to sign in here.
  • The Unity ID account pages will not load

sections.title: Cause
content: In May 2016, we updated our systems to support tls1.2 only. This means that some Windows systems and browsers may no longer have access unless tls1.2 is enabled.

sections.title: Resolution
content: If you come across this problem in your own system, please enable tls1.2.

sections.title: More Information
content: For more information on Transport Level Security, please see this Microsoft Support page.
